mapper.sql: select review_no, title, content, hits, recommend, reg_date, member_id, (select count(*) from REVIEW_REPLY where review_reply.review_no = review.review_no) reply_count from review
mapper.insert:
select review_no_seq.nextval from dual
insert into review (review_no, title, content, hits, recommend, reg_date, member_id) values (#{reviewNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{hits}, #{recommend}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS'), #{memberId})
mapper.delete: delete from review where review_no=#{reviewNo} and member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.select: select review_no, title from review where substr(reg_date, 1,10) = #{today} and rownum < 6 ORDER BY HITS desc
select review_no, title from review where substr(reg_date, 1,7) = #{month} and rownum < 6 ORDER BY HITS desc
